explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a red hood and a brown suit stands by a table with a red and white checkered tablecloth. He holds a spoon in his left hand with a portion of spaghetti on it, about to hand it to someone sitting opposite him. The wall in the background is grey. There is a blue frame in the middle of the screen.

[0-7] The man blows on the spoon, preparing to feed the person in front of him, but a hand reaches out and swats his hand away. The scene then switches to a boy in a red shirt sitting opposite the man. The man feeds milk to the boy, who shakes his head from side to side to avoid it. There is also a small white chick doll and a box of yellow drinks on the table. As the boy shakes his head, the motion coincides with the blue frame.
